title: my game is freezing / glitching.... with no lag or fps skip
body: this has happened to me since the pre season 7 patch... like literally then... i have replaced my computer. had my internet upgraded. replaced all cords. and still this issue happens. whats going on here? its no longer playable for me

replies.body: Are you on Windows 10?  There was an update a while back that auto-enabled the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) bar and caused freezing like this for some players.  To the point that only a restart would fix.  Disabling that should help, but let me know.
